mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element GroupCharacteristic

Documentation:

An inclusion or exclusion criterion as part of defining a cohort.

Ancestors:
  • GroupCharacteristic
Used By:
  • Group

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      Code

      The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Code
      1..1
      GroupCharacteristicValue

      The value or range of the characteristic.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      GroupCharacteristicValue
      0..1
      ExcludeFlag

      If true, exclude the subjects that match the criterion.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ExcludeFlag
      1..1
      TimePeriod

      A period of time defined by a start and end time, date, or year. If the start date/time is missing, the start of the period is not known. If the end date/time is missing, it means that the period is ongoing.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      TimePeriod
      0..1
